mapper.insert: insert into smart_user (name, password, version) values (#{name}, #{password}, #{version})
mapper.update: update smart_user set name = #{name}, password = #{password}, version = #{version} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from smart_user t where t.id = #{id}
select * from smart_user t where t.name = #{name} and t.password = #{password}
